general_advisory: Harvest the matured paddy. If 80% of the panicles are matured, farmers can go for the harvesting. Reduce the moisture of the harvested paddy by sun drying it. Rodent- If 'Rodent/Rats' problem is noticed, locate the rodent burrow in the crop field and surrounding areas. Place Aluminium Phosphide 6% tablet @ One tablet (12 gm) per burrow and seal the burrow with mud which will kill the rodents.

advisory: To control leaf eating caterpillar and fruit borer in winter vegetables like Brinjal, Cauliflower, Cabbage, Chilli & tomato apply 0.4 ml Spinosad per liter of water.
For controlling Red Rot disease in Sugarcane, spray Carbendazim 12% + Mancozeb 63 % WP @ 400 g /acre or Metalaxyl 8 % + Mancozeb 64 % WP @ 400 g/acre by mixing it in 200 litre of water.
Right time to take up Paira crop which can be sown 15 days before harvesting of paddy.
There is a chance of powdery mildew disease in Black gram and Green gram. To control this disease, spray Sulphur 80% WP @800 g/acre or Hexaconazole 5% E.C @ 300 ml/acre.
There is a chance of powdery mildew disease in Black gram and Green gram. To control this disease, spray Sulphur 80% WP @800 g/acre or Hexaconazole 5% E.C @ 300 ml/acre.
To control downy mildew in Pointed gourd, Spray Metalaxyl 8% + Mancozeb 64% W.P @ 400 g/acre or Fosetyl-AL 80 % WP @ 600 g/acre.
